name: A knight's end
description:
ATTENTION!

IF MUSIC DOES NOT PLAY WHEN YOU OPEN THE GAME:

GO TO SETTING AND DRAG THE SLIDER.

You are a knight inside a cave fighting monster, but when you die something magic happens

if you want to use the main menu theme, you can use it freely.

if you want to use the game them ( risk-136788 ) you have to contact the artist ( see below )

The link for the artists of the game music: Music by StudioKolomna from Pixabay

The link for the font: https://www.1001fonts.com/arcadeclassic-font.html
